Reviews.Title: “Really awesome!”
Reviews.Author: Liza A
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very clean and I was very impressed with the kitchenette. Service was great! Hotel location was among lots of restaurants and shopping.

Reviews.Title: “Terrible customer service”
Reviews.Author: bhaffar
Reviews.Content: This motel doesn't have a business office so I asked the front desk clerk to help me print my boarding pass but she refused to so I walked over to the Ramada Inn next door and the clerk there printed my boarding pass without hesitstion even though I wasn't a guest there. That is what good customer service looks like Extended Stay management. Next, I called the front desk to schedule a wake up call. It took me 3 attempts calling 10 minutes apart letting the phone ring for about 2 minutes each call before someone picked up the phone. Also, my room had leaking shower that dripped all night and long strands of hair were found in my "clean" sheets.

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Cathy W
Reviews.Content: I spent 6+ months at this hotel. The staff is awesome!! They are doing alot of renovations, updating constantly. My room was clean, and well cared for. Being on the road for work can be very trying, but my experience here was great!!

Reviews.Title: “clean room, bed kinda stiff, hotel ran out of toilet paper and towels”
Reviews.Author: matt2012ad
Reviews.Content: This hotel is centrally located in hotel circle, the staff is very nice, they allow pets, the room was clean on arrival, each room has a kitchen. As an extended stay in there is no daily house keeping service. only once per week. At check in we were told to come to the front desk for extra towels etc. however the front desk on day two said they were out of clean towels until the following day, they had no toilet paper, and no regular coffee for the in room coffee pots just decaf. We were given an extra box of tissue paper to suffice as toilet paper. The hotel was quiet, room had a flat screen tv the free continental breakfast consists of coffee, those odd tasting muffins wrapped in plastic, apples, oatmeal, bananas somedays cereal bars, Mixed feelings clean, good location, very cheap light blankets that do not keep you warm,not a very comfortable bed, no room service, running out of toilet paper etc yet quiet and pet friendly.. you need to make up your mind on this one.. Would not stay here if we were traveling without our dog.

HotelInfo.Name: Extended StayAmerica Hotel Circle
HotelInfo.Address: 2087 Hotel Circle South, San Diego, CA 92108
